page.title: 10Recreation,Agnes,Scilly
page.content: People go swimming,playing and picnicking on the beaches and sunbathing. They go boating,water ski-ing, diving, fishing and wind-surfing.There is a grass tennis court and a cricket pitch on the meadow. The Island hall has table tennis, snooker, space invader games and a small trampoline.Walking and bird spotting is very popular.Many people go on boat trips for bird spotting and to see Bishop Rock lighthouse and to visit other Islands .Boats go daily in the tourist season. There are also gig races every friday in the summer.These rowing boats from the different Islands race against each other.
